scripts.clean: node --input-type=module -e "import { rmSync } from 'fs'; rmSync('dist', { recursive: true, force: true });"
scripts.build:assets: node --input-type=module -e "import { mkdirSync, copyFileSync } from 'fs'; mkdirSync('dist/spec', { recursive: true }); copyFileSync('spec/gamespec.schema.json', 'dist/spec/gamespec.schema.json');"
scripts.build: pnpm run clean && pnpm run build:ts && pnpm run build:assets
